snippet.title: What's going on at Sunshine Plaza?
snippet.content:
AN ALARM is screaming at the Sunshine Coast's biggest shopping centre.
Emergency services have confirmed that they are responding to an incident at Sunshine Plaza.
A shopper told the Daily they witnessed fire doors slamming down as sirens wailed.
The plaza has not been evacuated.
More to come.
